remarks: Transform a hypothesis ` ps ` that we want to keep (but contains the same class variable ` A ` used in the eliminated hypothesis) for use with the weak deduction theorem.  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1999.)
statement:
keephyp.1 $e |- ( A = if ( ph , A , B ) -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
keephyp.2 $e |- ( B = if ( ph , A , B ) -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
keephyp.3 $e |- ps $.
keephyp.4 $e |- ch $.
keephyp $p |- th $.
